H0.text: Which Spanish soup containing onions, tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers and traditionally thickened with stale breadcrumbs is always served cold . Salmorejo

H1.text: Which Spanish soup containing onions, tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers and traditionally thickened with stale breadcrumbs is always served cold . Porra

H2.text: Which Spanish soup containing onions, tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers and traditionally thickened with stale breadcrumbs is always served cold . Ajoblanco

H3.text: Which Spanish soup containing onions, tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers and traditionally thickened with stale breadcrumbs is always served cold . Gazpacho

A4.text: Salmorejo is served cold and may be garnished with diced Spanish ib√©rico ham and diced hard-boiled eggs.

A5.text: In gazpacho, stale bread soaked in water is generally used.
